member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantCommandRunner
member.summary: Base class for Vagrant subcommands

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantCommandRunner.Settings
member.summary: Settings for invocation of the Vagrant CLI

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantCommandRunner.Log
member.summary: Logging output

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantCommandRunner.Runner
member.summary: Action to trigger invocation of the CLI

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantPluginRunner
member.summary: Wrapper around the vagrant plugin subcommands

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantPluginRunner.#ctor(Cake.Core.Diagnostics.ICakeLog,System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.VagrantSettings,Cake.Core.IO.ProcessArgumentBuilder},Cake.Vagrant.VagrantSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class
member.param: Logging output
Action to trigger invocation of the CLI
Settings for invocation of the Vagrant CLI

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantPluginRunner.Install(System.String,System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings})
member.summary: This installs a plugin with the given name or file path.
member.remarks: If the name is not a path to a file, then the plugin is installed from remote repositories, usually RubyGems.
member.param: Name or path of the plugin to install
Optional settings to control the installation process

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantPluginRunner.Install(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings})
member.summary: This installs multiple plugins at the same time with the given names or paths
member.param: A list of names of plugins to install
Optional settings to control the installation process

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantPluginRunner.Uninstall(System.String[])
member.summary: This uninstalls the plugin with the given name. If multiple plugins are given, multiple plugins will be uninstalled.
member.remarks: Any dependencies of the plugin will also be uninstalled assuming no other plugin needs them.
member.param: Names of the plugins to uninstall

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantPluginRunner.Update(System.String)
member.summary: This updates the plugins that are installed within Vagrant.
member.remarks: If you specified version constraints when installing the plugin, this command will respect those constraints. If you want to change a version constraint, re-install the plugin using
member.param: If a name is specified, only that single plugin will be updated

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantSnapshotRunner
member.summary: Wrapper around the vagrant snapshot subcommands

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantSnapshotRunner.#ctor(Cake.Core.Diagnostics.ICakeLog,System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.VagrantSettings,Cake.Core.IO.ProcessArgumentBuilder},Cake.Vagrant.VagrantSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class
member.param: Logging output
Action to trigger invocation of the CLI
Settings for invocation of the Vagrant CLI

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantSnapshotRunner.Push
member.summary: This takes a snapshot and pushes it onto the snapshot stack.

remarks.para: This is a shorthand for where you do not need to specify a name.
Warning: If you are using and , avoid using and which are unsafe to mix.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantSnapshotRunner.Pop(System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantSnapshotRestoreSettings})
member.summary: This command is the inverse of : it will restore the pushed state.
member.param: Optional settings to control the restore

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantSnapshotRunner.Save(System.String)
member.summary: This command saves a new named snapshot.
member.remarks: If this command is used, the and subcommands cannot be safely used.
member.param: Name of the snapshot

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantSnapshotRunner.Restore(System.String,System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantSnapshotRestoreSettings})
member.summary: This command restores the named snapshot.
member.param: Name of the snapshot to restore
Optional settings to control the restore

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantSnapshotRunner.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: This command will delete the named snapshot.
member.param: Name of the snapshot to delete

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantBoxRunner
member.summary: Wrapper around the vagrant box subcommands

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantBoxRunner.Add(System.String,System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings})
member.summary: This adds a box with the given address to Vagrant.
member.param: Can be: shorthand name from Atlas, file path or URL to a box either locally or in a catalog
Optional settings to use when adding the box

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantBoxRunner.List
member.summary: Lists all installed boxes

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantBoxRunner.Outdated(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This command tells you whether or not the box you are using in your current Vagrant environment is outdated.
member.param: If true, every installed box will be checked for updates.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantBoxRunner.Remove(System.String,System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings})
member.summary: This command removes a box from Vagrant that matches the given name.
member.remarks: If a box has multiple providers, the exact provider must be specified with the property.
member.param: Name of the box to remove
Optional settings for removing a box.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantBoxRunner.Repackage(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This command repackages the given box and puts it in the current directory so you can redistribute it.
member.remarks: This command is useful for reclaiming a *.box file from an installed Vagrant box.
member.param: Name of the machine to repackage
Name of the provider (from )
Version to repackage (from )

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantBoxRunner.Update(System.Action{Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettings})
member.summary: This command updates the box for the current Vagrant environment if there are updates available
member.remarks: Note that updating the box will not update an already-running Vagrant machine. To reflect the changes in the box, you will have to destroy and bring back up the Vagrant machine.
member.param: Optional settings to use for updating

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantDockerRunner
member.summary: Wrapper around the vagrant docker subcommands

member.summary: Gets a new instance of the class
member.param: Logging output
Action to trigger invocation of the CLI
Settings for invocation of the Vagrant CLI

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantDockerRunner.Exec(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Can be used to run one-off commands against a Docker container that is currently running
member.remarks: If the container is not running, an error will be returned.
member.param: Name of the container to run against
Command to execute. This will NOT be quoted.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Commands.VagrantDockerRunner.Run(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Can be used to run one-off commands against a Docker container that is currently running
member.remarks: If the container is not running, an error will be returned.
member.param: Name of the container to run against
Command to execute. This will NOT be quoted.

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings
member.summary: Additional settings for vagrant box add command

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.Version
member.summary: The version of the box you want to add.
member.remarks: By default, the latest version will be added
member.value: Can be an exact version number such as "1.2.3" or it can be a set of version constraints like ">= 1.0, < 2.0"

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.CACertificate
member.summary: The certificate for the CA used to verify the peer. This should be used if the remote end does not use a standard root CA.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.CAPath
member.summary: The certificate directory for the CA used to verify the peer. This should be used if the remote end does not use a standard root CA.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.CertificatePath
member.summary: A client certificate to use when downloading the box, if necessary.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.Clean
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to clean any existing temporary files before downloading
member.remarks: This is useful if you do not want Vagrant to resume a download from a previous point, perhaps because the contents changed.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.Force
member.summary: When present, the box will be downloaded and overwrite any existing box with this name.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.Insecure
member.summary: When present, SSL certificates will not be verified if the URL is an HTTPS URL.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.Provider
member.summary: If given, Vagrant will verify the box you are adding is for the given provider.
member.remarks: By default, Vagrant automatically detects the proper provider to use.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings.GetToolArguments
member.summary: Gets the command arguments corresponding to the specified settings
member.returns: An action to add required command arguments

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions
member.summary: Fluent extension methods for the class

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.ConstrainVersion(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the version or version constraint to use when downloading the box
member.param: The settings
A version constraint to use (see )

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.UseCertificateAuthority(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,Cake.Core.IO.IDirectory)
member.summary: Sets the property for the CA used to verify the peer
member.param: The settings
The certificate directory to use

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.UseCertificateAuthority(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Sets the property for the CA certificate used to verify the peer
member.param: The settings
The certificate file to use

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.WithClientCertificate(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Sets the property for a client certificate to use when downloading the box, if necessary.
member.param: The settings
Path to the cert file to use

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.AllowInsecure(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables unverified/untrusted SSL certificates when using HTTPS URLs.
member.param: The settings
Whether to allow insecure certs. Defaults to true

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.UseProvider(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,System.String)
member.summary: Requests a specific provider as per the property
member.param: The settings
The requested provider

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.Force(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Forces downloading and overwriting any box with the same name
member.param: The settings
Whether to force the download. Defaults to true.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettingsExtensions.CleanFirst(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxAddSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables cleaning any temporary or partial download files first.
member.param: The settings
Whether to clean first. Defaults to true.

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings
member.summary: Additional settings for the vagrant box remove command

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings.RemoveAll
member.summary: Remove all available versions of a box.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings.Force
member.summary: Forces removing the box even if an active Vagrant environment is using it.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings.BoxVersion
member.summary: Version of version constraints of the boxes to remove. See for more details.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings.Provider
member.summary: The provider-specific box to remove with the given name.
member.remarks: This is only required if a box is backed by multiple providers. If there is only a single provider, Vagrant will default to removing it.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings.GetToolArguments
member.summary: Gets the command arguments corresponding to the specified settings
member.returns: An action to add required command arguments

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettingsExtensions
member.summary: Fluent extension methods for the class

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettingsExtensions.ConstrainVersion(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the version constraint for the box to remove
member.remarks: See for more information
member.param: The settings
Version constraint to match against

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettingsExtensions.RemoveAll(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings)
member.summary: Remove all available versions of a box.
member.param: The settings

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettingsExtensions.UseProvider(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings,System.String)
member.summary: The provider-specific box to remove with the given name.
member.param: The settings
The specific provider to remove

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettingsExtensions.Force(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxRemoveSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Forces removing the box even if an active Vagrant environment is using it.
member.param: The settings
true to force removal. Defaults to true

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettings
member.summary: Additional settings for the vagrant box update command

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettings.BoxName
member.summary: Name of a specific box to update.
member.remarks: If this flag is not specified, Vagrant will update the boxes for the active Vagrant environment.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettings.Provider
member.summary: When is present, this controls what provider-specific box to update.
member.remarks: This is not required unless the box has multiple providers.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettings.GetToolArguments
member.summary: Gets the command arguments corresponding to the specified settings
member.returns: An action to add required command arguments

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettingsExtensions
member.summary: Fluent extension methods for the class

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettingsExtensions.UseProvider(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettings,System.String)
member.summary: Controls what provider-specific box to update
member.param: The settings
The provider name to update

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettingsExtensions.OnlyUpdate(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantBoxUpdateSettings,System.String)
member.summary: Set the name of a specific box to update
member.remarks: When using this option, the box does not need to be part of the active environment
member.param: The settings
Name of the box to update

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings
member.summary: Additional settings for the vagrant init command

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings.Force
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force initialization, even if an existing Vagrantfile is found
member.value: If true, this command will overwite any existing Vagrantfile

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings.Minimal
member.summary: This enables the creation of a more minimal Vagrantfile that does not contain the instructional comments the normal Vagrantfile contains
member.value: true to create a minimal file. Defaults to false

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings.OutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file to output the Vagrantfile to
member.value: File path for the new Vagrantfile. If this is "-", the Vagrantfile will be sent to stdout.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings.VersionConstraint
member.summary: The box version or box version constraint to add to the Vagrantfile

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings.GetToolArguments
member.summary: Gets the command arguments corresponding to the specified settings
member.returns: An action to add required command arguments

member.summary: Fluent extension methods for the class

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettingsExtensions.Force(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables overwriting any existing Vagrantfile
member.param: Settings
Where to enable --force

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettingsExtensions.CreateMinimal(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings)
member.summary: Enables creation of a more minimal Vagrantfile without instructional comments
member.param: The settings

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettingsExtensions.OutputToFile(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Sets the to output the new Vagrantfile to

Desired path for the new Vagrantfile

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettingsExtensions.ConstrainVersion(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantInitSettings,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the box version or box version constraint to add to the Vagrantfile

VM name or UUID

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPackageSettingsExtensions.OutputToFile(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPackageSettings,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings
member.summary: Additional settings for the vagrant plugin install command.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings.EntryPoint
member.summary: If the plugin you are installing has another entrypoint, this flag can be used to specify it.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings.CleanSources
member.summary: Clears all sources that have been defined so far.
member.remarks: This is an advanced feature.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings.Source
member.summary: Adds a source from which to fetch a plugin.
member.remarks: Note that this does not only affect the single plugin being installed, by all future plugin as well. This is a limitation of the underlying plugin installer Vagrant uses.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings.Version
member.summary: The version of the plugin to install. By default, this command will install the latest version.

remarks.para: You can set it to a specific version, such as "1.2.3" or you can set it to a version constraint, such as " > 1.0.2". You can set it to a more complex constraint by comma-separating multiple constraints: "> 1.0.2, < 1.1.0"

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings.GetToolArguments
member.summary: Gets the command arguments corresponding to the specified
member.returns: An action to add required command arguments

member.summary: Fluent extension methods for the class

member.summary: Sets the for a plugin.
member.param: The settings
The entry point for the plugin

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettingsExtensions.CleanFirst(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clears all sources that have been defined so far.
member.param: The settings
Whether to clean sources first.

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettingsExtensions.FromSource(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantPluginInstallSettings,System.String)

member.summary: The version of the plugin to install.

The version or version constraint to use (as per )

true to run provisioners, false to skip

Whether to force provisioners to run. Defaults to true

member.summary: Prevents deletion of the snapshot after restoring (so that you can restore to the same point again later).
member.param: The settings

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantSnapshotRestoreSettingsExtensions.Delete(Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantSnapshotRestoreSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Forces deletion of the snapshot after restoring
member.remarks: Opposite of , included for more logical invocation
member.param: The settings
Whether to delete the snapshot. Defaults to true.

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantSSHSettings
member.summary: Additional settings for the vagrant ssh command

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantSSHSettings.Command
member.summary: The command to run on your machine.
member.remarks: This is mandatory! Without it, script execution will block!
member.value: This value will be quoted when invoked.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantSSHSettings.DoNotAuthenticate
member.summary: OBSOLETE: Setting this will cause unexpected results and may block scripts.

member.name: T:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantUpSettings
member.summary: Additional settings for the vagrant up command

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantUpSettings.DestroyOnError
member.summary: Destroy the newly created machine if a fatal, unexpected error occurs. This will only happen on the first vagrant up. By default this is set.
member.value: true to destroy the machine. Defaults to true

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantUpSettings.InstallProvider
member.summary: If the requested provider is not installed, Vagrant will attempt to automatically install it if it can. By default this is enabled.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantUpSettings.Parallel
member.summary: Bring multiple machines up in parallel if the provider supports it. Please consult the provider documentation to see if this feature is supported.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantUpSettings.Provider
member.summary: Bring the machine up with the given provider. By default this is "virtualbox".

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantUpSettings.RunProvisioners
member.summary: Force the provisioners to run.

member.name: P:Cake.Vagrant.Settings.VagrantUpSettings.Provisioners
member.summary: This will only run the given provisioners.
member.value: Providers to run. Omit the leading `:`

member.summary: Gets the command arguments corresponding to the specified
member.returns: An action to add required command arguments

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.VagrantRunner.Reload(System.String)

member.remarks: This command is usually required for changes made in the Vagrantfile to take effect.
member.param: Settings to control the execution of provisioners

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.VagrantRunner.Destroy(System.String)
member.summary: This command stops the running machine Vagrant is managing and destroys all resources that were created during the machine creation process.
member.param: Optional name of the machine to destroy

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.VagrantRunner.Halt(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This command shuts down the running machine Vagrant is managing.
member.param: Optional name of the machine to halt
Whether to forcefully halt the machine (equivalent to pulling the power)

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.VagrantRunner.Suspend(System.String)
member.summary: This suspends the guest machine Vagrant is managing, rather than shutting it down
member.remarks: A suspend effectively saves the exact point-in-time state of the machine, so that when you resume it later, it begins running immediately from that point, rather than doing a full boot.
member.param: Optional name of the machine to suspend

member.name: M:Cake.Vagrant.VagrantRunner.Package(System.String)
member.summary: This packages a currently running VirtualBox environment into a re-usable box.
member.remarks: This command can only be used with other providers based on the provider implementation and if the provider supports it.
member.param: Optional name of the machine to package

member.param: Settings to use when packaging the box
